prompt-hotels: [{"TASK":"Curate hotel options for The Show Place Arena (venue_uid=wihs-venue)","Location":"city: Upper Marlboro city_uid=upper-marlboro, state:MD state_uid=md.","GEO context":"lat=38.8108793, lon=-76.7493977 placeid=EjoxNDkwMCBQZW5uc3lsdmFuaWEgQXZlLiAjMmMsIFVwcGVyIE1hcmxib3JvLCBNRCAyMDc3MiwgVVNBIh4aHAoWChQKEgmP5vlqp5a3iRF0eWCj8rFCeBICMmM.","Official venue link":"https://wihs.org/","Audience":"Competitive hunter/jumper riders on the A-circuit (trainers, grooms, show parents). Prioritize tight ring windows, early schooling, late features, and parking for trucks/trailers.","Tone":"Practical, insider, authoritative. Use real A-circuit phrasing (warm-up ring, jog strip, vendor row, stabling, drags, splits). No fluff.","Buckets":[{"label":"–$$$","description":"Practical/groom-friendly within ~20–25 min; easy surface lots; walkable food."},{"label":"$$$$","description":"Owner-trainer/boutique up to ~35 min; quiet, reliable service; valet/self-park clarity."}],"Must_have_amenities_any":["reliable Wi-Fi","late check-in","early coffee or breakfast","laundry access (in-house or nearby)","truck/trailer-friendly or large surface lot"],"Hard_excludes":["Motel 6","Red Roof Inn","Econo Lodge","Super 8","Rodeway Inn","weekly-rate motels","properties with persistent safety complaints"],"Safety emphasis":["well-lit parking","quiet rooms (away from nightlife)","walkable dining for grooms"],"Name_parsing":"If brand + locality (e.g., 'Hilton Garden Inn Ocala Downtown'), set hotel_name='Hilton Garden Inn', name2='Ocala Downtown'. If generic (e.g., 'Equus Inn Ocala'), set hotel_name='Equus Inn', name2='Ocala'.\",\"Chain_parsing\": \"If chain provided like 'Hilton (Hilton Garden Inn)', set chain='Hilton', chain2='Hilton Garden Inn'. Else chain='Independent', chain2='Independent'.","Amenity_normalization":"Return amenities as a semicolon-separated string OR array; prefer concise, rider-useful items (early breakfast, laundry, parking notes).","Safety_notes_style":"One sentence, concrete location/policy guidance (e.g., 'Use garage; avoid street parking with tack.').","Approx_drive_format":"Use ranges like '20–25 min'; reflect typical traffic on US-301/Largo/Bowie corridors.","Flagged budget motel chains to avoid":"Motel 6, Red Roof Inn, Econo Lodge, Super 8, Rodeway Inn.","Reference schema":"https://crt-b1434e13de34.herokuapp.com/items/agents/hub-knowledge/examples/hotel-curator_example.json","Duplicates":"Deduplicate near-identical listings; prefer the newest/most reliable page.","Minimum required JSON fields":"venue_uid, bucket, name, approx_drive, chain, amenities, safety_notes, url"}]

data-dine-am:
{
  "venue_uid": "wihs-venue",
  "bucket": "am",
  "params": {
    "search_mode": "breakfast_only",
    "max_distance_m": 5000,
    "price_range": "$$",
    "cuisine_allowlist_any": ["American", "Cafe", "Bakery", "Diner", "Coffee", "Brunch", "Bagels"],
    "menu_keywords_any": ["breakfast", "morning", "brunch", "bagel", "egg", "omelet", "biscuit", "grits", "hash browns", "pancakes", "waffles", "french toast", "breakfast burrito", "breakfast sandwich", "latte", "coffee", "espresso", "cold brew", "pastry", "muffin", "croissant", "yogurt parfait", "oatmeal"],
    "hours_requirements": { "opens_by_or_before": "10:30", "days": ["Mon","Tue","Wed","Thu","Fri","Sat","Sun"] },
    "hard_excludes": ["dinner only", "steakhouse", "bar", "brewery", "cocktail", "wine bar", "nightclub", "late-night only", "reservation only", "members only"],
    "sort": ["distance_m", "opens_at", "reliability_score"]
  },
  "results": [
    {
      "name": "Dunkin’ – Upper Marlboro",
      "approx_drive": "5 min / 1.6 mi",
      "distance_m": 2500,
      "cuisine": "Coffee, Bakery, Breakfast",
      "opens_at": "05:00",
      "sample_breakfast_items": ["bagels", "egg & cheese breakfast sandwich", "muffins", "hash browns", "latte"],
      "at_least_one_menu_keyword": true,
      "safety_notes": "drive-thru reliable for quick turnaround",
      "source_link": "https://www.dunkindonuts.com/en/menu/breakfast-sandwiches"
    },
    {
      "name": "Panera Bread – Largo",
      "approx_drive": "8 min / 3.0 mi",
      "distance_m": 4800,
      "cuisine": "Cafe, Bakery, Breakfast",
      "opens_at": "06:00",
      "sample_breakfast_items": ["avocado egg white sandwich", "soufflés", "bagels", "oatmeal", "coffee"],
      "at_least_one_menu_keyword": true,
      "safety_notes": "mobile ordering speeds up pickup",
      "source_link": "https://www.panerabread.com/en-us/menu/categories/breakfast.html"
    },
    {
      "name": "IHOP – Upper Marlboro",
      "approx_drive": "9 min / 4.2 mi",
      "distance_m": 4900,
      "cuisine": "Diner, American, Breakfast",
      "opens_at": "06:00",
      "sample_breakfast_items": ["pancakes", "omelets", "hash browns", "breakfast burrito", "french toast"],
      "at_least_one_menu_keyword": true,
      "safety_notes": "sit-down option; service usually fast in mornings",
      "source_link": "https://www.ihop.com/en/menu/breakfast"
    },
    {
      "name": "Starbucks – Largo Center Dr",
      "approx_drive": "7 min / 2.9 mi",
      "distance_m": 4600,
      "cuisine": "Coffee, Cafe, Breakfast",
      "opens_at": "05:00",
      "sample_breakfast_items": ["bacon gouda breakfast sandwich", "croissant", "egg bites", "yogurt parfait", "cold brew"],
      "at_least_one_menu_keyword": true,
      "safety_notes": "drive-thru line can back up; mobile order ahead",
      "source_link": "https://www.starbucks.com/menu/food/hot-breakfast"
    }
  ]
}

prompt-link:
TASK: Curate venue links for [{"venue_official_name":"The Show Place Arena","state_uid":["recfffglVZKxKv6gS"],"venue_official_link":"https://wihs.org/","city_uid":["recAVvfPYaKgGBw6u"],"placeId":"EjoxNDkwMCBQZW5uc3lsdmFuaWEgQXZlLiAjMmMsIFVwcGVyIE1hcmxib3JvLCBNRCAyMDc3MiwgVVNBIh4aHAoWChQKEgmP5vlqp5a3iRF0eWCj8rFCeBICMmM","formatted_addressv3":"14900 Pennsylvania Ave, Upper Marlboro, MD 20772","venue_recordId":"rec8LYnEVqQYzK3B6"}] (venue_uid=[{"venue_official_name":"The Show Place Arena","state_uid":["recfffglVZKxKv6gS"],"venue_official_link":"https://wihs.org/","city_uid":["recAVvfPYaKgGBw6u"],"placeId":"EjoxNDkwMCBQZW5uc3lsdmFuaWEgQXZlLiAjMmMsIFVwcGVyIE1hcmxib3JvLCBNRCAyMDc3MiwgVVNBIh4aHAoWChQKEgmP5vlqp5a3iRF0eWCj8rFCeBICMmM","formatted_addressv3":"14900 Pennsylvania Ave, Upper Marlboro, MD 20772","venue_recordId":"rec8LYnEVqQYzK3B6"}]), The Show Place Arena represents an Equestrian Venue located near , Location: 14900 Pennsylvania Ave, Upper Marlboro, MD 20772, GEO context: lat=38.8108793, lon=-76.7493977 placeid=EjoxNDkwMCBQZW5uc3lsdmFuaWEgQXZlLiAjMmMsIFVwcGVyIE1hcmxib3JvLCBNRCAyMDc3MiwgVVNBIh4aHAoWChQKEgmP5vlqp5a3iRF0eWCj8rFCeBICMmM., ### Venue Link Field Definitions - venue_official_link → Canonical homepage for the venue. - venue_link_stay → On-site or affiliated lodging (hotels, resorts, rentals). - venue_link_dine → Venue-hosted or recommended dining/restaurants. - venue_link_locale → “Things to do” / local attractions content. - venue_link_events → Events schedule page (official calendar of shows). - venue_link_rvparks → Dedicated RV or campground info. - venue_link_vendors → Vendor Row / exhibitor marketplace. - venue_link_essentials → Practical services: groceries, pharmacy, tack. - venue_link_riders → Rider services: entries, scratches, registration info. - venue_link_barn → Barn & stabling: stalls, hay, bedding, feed services. - venue_link_services → On-site professional services: braiding, vet, farrier. - venue_link_results → Competition results, standings, order of go. - venue_link_carts → Golf cart rentals or mobility vehicles. - venue_link_cars → Car rental or transportation services., Goal: For each populated link, extract canonical content and return JSON.

venue_uid, category, field, url, canonical_title, meta_description, keywords, notes
